ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents the Incoming Task checkbox to be marked TRUE if the required criteria are not met.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL (Status__c, "Pending Assignment"), ISPICKVAL (Status__c, "Draft")), Incoming_Handover_Tasks_Completed__c = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Incoming Handover Task cannot be completed when Status is still in Draft or Pending Assignment.
